comment: I don't know what happened, yet after my second spin the app completely locked up. No amount of uninstalling or restarting fix the problem. I've uninstalled.

author: Justin Howard
comment: I'm back to level 1, and all gems gone? Made the mistake of uninstalling and reinstalling. Lost over 600,000 in coins. Not happy at all considering I have invested into this game.
title: What happened!?

author: John Wood
comment: Game play is simple,  good graphics,!  Unfortunately I'm now on level one with no crystals  and 55 million in the bank...  And I can only play the first machine now!

author: Strike Light
comment: Edit: Looks like the level bug is back. I'm back at level 1 again even though I have 9 mill in chips.....

reply.author: White Cat Studios
reply.content: Glad it worked out for you! enjoy

title: My favorite wear game

author: Jan Morrida
comment: Had to reset watch, I lost all my paid credits!, I had over 256000 credits, can you restore?

author: Ran Kornfeld
comment: Great slots experience for the watch!

author: Don Joslyn

reply.author: White Cat Studios
reply.content:
You are correct BUT:
1. You can get a free bonus every 4 hours! 
2. Currently buying coins is free of charge! try clicking the buy buttons.

title: Game is free but you must buy coins to continue playing!

reply.author: White Cat Studios
reply.content: Please email info@slotowatch.com with details about your specific problem and we will try to sort it out. Thanks.
